description.value:
+20 Toughness against extreme environments. Good and Best suits provide +25 and +30 Respectively. Poor only lasts for 3 Days before needing recharge in safer environment.

Requirements

Maintains Body Temperature, "reclaims" drinking water.

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: -
